sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat. 2. Add minced garlic and sliced bird's eye chili, cook until fragrant. 3. Add minced chicken breast and cook until browned. 4. Stir in fish sauce, oyster sauce, soy sauce, and brown sugar. 5. Add Thai basil leaves and cook until wilted. 6. Serve hot over cooked jasmine rice. 7. Top with a fried egg if desired.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Chicken Breast (500g, minced), Thai Basi</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Thai Basil Chicken</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 25g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 35g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Mince garlic. 2. Slice bird's eye chili.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>bc91d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afe3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
